item.name: Calamari
item.desc: Tender calamari, lightly breaded and fried. Served with marinara sauce and creamy ranch.

item.name: Soupe à l'oignon
item.desc: A rich and hearty broth stocked full with onions topped with seasoned croutons and melted Swiss cheese. Served in a crock.

item.name: Beef Wellington
item.desc: Tender, flavorful beef encased in earthy mushrooms, rich p√¢te, and a flaky pastry

item.name: Ramen
item.desc: Japanese noodle soup consists of Chinese-style wheat noodles served in a meat- or fish-based broth, flavored with miso, top with sliced pork ,dried seaweed, kamaboko, green onions and corn.

item.name: Belgian Waffles
item.desc: Plain Belgian waffles, sprinkled with a mixture of cinnamon & sugar

item.name: Bubble Tea
item.desc: Flavor options: Chocolate, Coconut, Green Tea.
